title: President Truman, Rear Platform Remarks, Libby, Montana
Description: President Harry S. Truman, Rear Platform Remarks, Libby, Montana, October 1, 1952, 3:25 p.m.  He is campaigning on behalf of Adlai Stevenson's presidential campaign. Transcript is available in Public Papers of the Presidents, Harry S. Truman, 1952.
Preservation: Master and reference reel-to-reel audio tapes at 7-1/2 i.p.s. from NARA ca. 1980's; reel-to-reel audio tape and cd from Cutting Corp., ca. 2001.
